title: Revenue Ton-Miles Per Ton of Coal Consumed in Freight Service, Class I Railroads for United States
notes:
Data For "Revenue Ton-Miles " Exclude Switching And Terminal Companies. Data For "Coal Consumption" Exclude These Components From 1920-1936; Include Them Thereafter. Source: Computed By NBER By Dividing Series 03037 (Revenue Ton-Miles) By Series 03047 (Tons Of Coal Or Equivalent Consumption In Road Freight Service); Data Are From Interstate Commerce Commision Sources.

This NBER data series m03048 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 3 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter03.html.

NBER Indicator: m03048
